data.lyric:
[ti:Sad People (Explicit)]
[ar:Kid Cudi]
[al:Man On The Moon III: The Chosen (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Sad People - Kid Cudi
[00:02.16]Lyrics by：Scott Mescudi/Oladipo Omishore/David Biral/Denzel Baptiste
[00:04.33]Composed by：Scott Mescudi/Oladipo Omishore/David Biral/Denzel Baptiste
[00:06.49]Mm-mm yeah
[00:12.91]Mm-mm
[00:18.59]In the dead of the night I have these dreams
[00:21.55]What'll happen to me Will I burn out
[00:25.08]Have I been wrong What does it mean
[00:28.15]All these things can't understand why
[00:31.91]Say something's wrong with me and I'm
[00:37.91]By myself alone driving I go
[00:43.16]Full moon as it glows I search for truth
[00:46.08]Tryna be brand new yeah I will try
[00:49.20]No I won't do but through these screams
[00:52.32]Fighting and bleed blood in my eye
[00:56.34]And I'll be another broken soul
[01:02.53]God save me
[01:07.27]Yeah baby I see you're back in my zone
[01:11.46]Just what I need mama
[01:13.14]Yeah
[01:13.77]N***a been in hell the same road
[01:17.08]On a mission and I'm gonna fly high
[01:20.06]High
[01:20.31]This for the sad people who keep the blunt burning in me
[01:26.55]And wе up on a journey learning
[01:31.47]Close call life on the edge
[01:33.92]High when the time comes I'll find peace
[01:37.42]It's in the search of nights I'm sittin' wishin'
[01:40.58]I can find love in me
[01:44.13]Lettin' go uhh this ain't living
[01:47.63]I swim in pain
[01:50.14]Never drown keep my head up above the waves
[01:55.44]Get it get it
[01:56.26]I ain't runnin' I won't run from fate
[01:59.04]Late night uhh this is when I come alive when the juice mane
[02:05.28]Take me uhh just don't leave me
[02:08.94]Come on woah
[02:12.03]Don't say goodnight
[02:13.69]Scars on my arm woah
[02:17.63]Ahh ahh ahh
[02:20.22]Yeah baby I see you're back in my zone
[02:24.38]Just what I need mama
[02:26.19]Yeah
[02:26.85]N***a been in hell the same road
[02:29.91]On a mission and I'm gonna fly high
[02:32.54]Hey
[02:33.04]This for the sad people who keep the blunt burning
[02:38.54]And we up on a journey learning
data.trans:
[ti:Sad People (Explicit)]
[ar:Kid Cudi]
[al:Man On The Moon III: The Chosen (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:02.16]//
[00:04.32]//
[00:06.49]//
[00:12.91]//
[00:18.59]在夜深人静时 我做了一些梦
[00:21.55]我会发生什么 我会不会崩溃
[00:25.08]我是不是错了 那是什么意思
[00:28.15]这么多事情 搞不懂为什么
[00:31.91]我好像出了什么问题
[00:37.91]我独自一人开着车
[00:43.16]一轮圆月 绽放光芒 我寻找真相
[00:46.08]想变成另一个人 我会努力
[00:49.20]我不会这样 但呐喊声不断
[00:52.32]战斗 流血 我的眼中充满血丝
[00:56.34]我的灵魂会变得残破不堪
[01:02.53]上帝救救我
[01:07.27]宝贝 看 我回到了我的世界中
[01:11.46]这就是我需要的 亲爱的
[01:13.14]//
[01:13.77]我一直身处炼狱 痛苦至极
[01:17.08]肩负重任 我要高飞
[01:20.06]高飞
[01:20.31]送给那些抽着香烟的可悲之人
[01:26.55]我们踏上旅途 探索世界
[01:31.47]千钧一发 命在旦夕
[01:33.92]总有一天 我会找到一片安宁
[01:37.42]寻找那迷人的夜 我坐在那里祈愿
[01:40.58]我可以找到心底的爱
[01:44.13]放手 这不是生活
[01:47.63]我在痛苦中游弋
[01:50.14]从不会被淹没 我始终把头伸出水面
[01:55.44]我可以的
[01:56.26]我不会逃 我不会逃避命运
[01:59.04]深夜时分 恰好是我苏醒过来的时候
[02:05.28]带我走 不要离开我
[02:08.94]来吧
[02:12.03]不要说晚安
[02:13.69]我的身上伤痕累累
[02:17.63]//
[02:20.22]宝贝 看 我回到了我的世界中
[02:24.38]这就是我需要的 亲爱的
[02:26.19]//
[02:26.85]我一直身处炼狱 痛苦至极
[02:29.91]肩负重任 我要高飞
[02:32.54]//
[02:33.04]送给那些抽着香烟的可悲之人
[02:38.54]我们踏上旅途 探索世界
